text: Version update prompt
Version update prompt:
In order to better protect your rights and interests, we have recently updated the "Guidelines for Privacy Property Privacy of the People".
The content of this update mainly includes:
label: Policy Change

text: (1) Refine the relevant situation of targeted push so that you can understand and manage your personal information in detail.
label: Policy Change

text: Reading prompt

Please read carefully before using/continue to use the products and/or services of the national K song, and fully understand the full text of the full version of "Guidelines for the Privacy Property Property Protection of the National K Song".

Unless otherwise explained, do not agree with the "Guidelines for the Privacy of the National K Songs" or its update (we will inform you in time) may affect your products and/or services that will continue to use normally or continue to use normally.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Do not agree that the "Guidelines for Privacy Property Privacy of the People" or its renewal may affect your products and/or services that will continue to use normally or continue to use them normally.

text: 1. The information we collect
The National K song is a product and service provided by Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "We").

Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd.'s registration address is the 35th floor of Tencent Building, Tencent Building, Maging Community Science and Technology Middle School, Yuehai Street, Nanshan District, Shenzhen.
During the product operation process, it will also jointly operate with affiliated companies, such as channel cooperation and brand linkage.

In the process of using the national K song service, the National K song will collect the information you actively provided by your service when using the service as follows, to provide you with services, optimize our services, and ensure your service to ensure youraccount security:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: All people K song third -party information sharing list

1.1, we use QQ or WeChat as our account system. When you log in to the national K song with QQ or WeChat association, we will collect your QQ or WeChat's unique logo, avatar, nickname, VIP information, friends information, possible knowing, you may know what possible you knowHuman information is used to save your login information so that you can synchronize your data when logging in with different devices, and learn about the listening information of your friends in the nation's K song.

First Party Collection Information

text: Among them, friends information and people you may know belong to your personal sensitive information. You can refuse to provide it by rejecting authorization when landing.

label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: The personal information collected will not be disclosed to the outside world. If it must be disclosed publicly, the purpose of the public disclosure, the type of disclosure information, and the sensitive information that may be involved, and obtain the consent.

text: With the sustainable development of our business, we may conduct merging, acquisition, asset transfer and other transactions. We will inform you that the relevant situation will continue to protect or request new control in accordance with laws and regulations and not lower than the standards required by the privacy protection guidelines.Continue to protect your personal information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: For mergers, acquisitions, asset transfer and other transactions, we will inform you of the relevant situation and continue to protect or request new controller to continue to protect your personal information.

text: In addition, in accordance with relevant laws and regulations and national standards, in the following situations, we may share, transfer, and openly disclose personal information without obtaining your authorization consent in advance:
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: In the following circumstances, we may share, transfer, and publicly disclose personal information without obtaining your authorization consent in advance:

text: To establish and fulfill your contract as a party as a party;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: The personal information necessary for sharing and fulfilling the contract does not need to ask for consent.

text: Related to the obligations stipulated in our performance of laws and regulations;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: Personal information related to the obligations stipulated in laws and regulations shall be shared without consent.

text: Directly related to national security and national defense security;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: Personal information directly related to national security and national defense security does not need to solicit consent.

text: In order to deal with emergencies, or directly related to public safety, public health, and major public interests;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: Personal information to shared the public health incidents does not need to ask for consent.

text: Directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial, and execution of judgment;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: Direct related personal information such as sharing with criminal investigation, prosecution, trial and judgment execution does not need to solicit consent.

text: It is difficult to obtain the major legitimate rights and interests of the life and property of the subject of personal information or other individuals; it is difficult to get my consent;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: Sharing and maintaining major legitimate rights and interests but difficult to get personal information that I agree, without asking for consent.

text: The subject of personal information disclose personal information to the public by themselves;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: If the subject of personal information disclose personal information to the public by itself, no consent is required.

text: Collect personal information from legal public information, such as legal news reports, government information disclosure and other channels
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: If you collect personal information from the legal disclosure information, you do not need to ask for consent.

text: Implement news reports, public opinion supervision and other behaviors for public interests, and handle personal information within a reasonable range;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: In order to implement news reports and supervision of public opinion, if you handle personal information within a reasonable range, you do not need to solicit consent.

text: Other circumstances stipulated in the law.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: If shared in other circumstances stipulated in the law, there is no need to solicit consent.

text: 6. Your rights

During your use of the national K song, in order to make you more conveniently inquire about access, delete, and correct your personal information, while ensuring your consent and the right to cancel your account of your personal information, we provide you with the corresponding product design in the product design.Operation settings, you can refer to the following guidelines for operation.

Edit/Control

text: 7. Change
We may amend the guidelines for privacy protection in a timely manner.

When the terms of the guidelines for privacy protection are changed, we will prompt you to prompt you the change of privacy protection guidance after the version update, and explain the effective date after the change.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite:
When the terms of the guidelines for privacy protection are changed, we will prompt you to the change of privacy protection guidelines when the version is updated, and explain to you
Essence

text: Please read the content of the privacy protection guidelines carefully, and you continue to use the national K song to indicate that you agree to deal with your personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidance.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You continue to use the national K song to indicate that you agree to handle personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidelines.

text: 8. Minor protection
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors.

In accordance with the provisions of relevant laws and regulations, we must require minors under the age of 14 to obtain the authorized consent of their guardians (such as their parents) before using the service of the national K song or providing personal information to us;
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minors under the age of fourteen should obtain the authorization consent of their guardian before using services or providing personal information.

text: Minors who have reached the age of 14, who are under eighteen, can obtain the authorization consent or self -authorization consent of their guardian in advance.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minors who have reached the age of 14, under the age of eighteen, can obtain the consent of the guardian or the consent of their own authorization in advance.

text: We only use, provide or need to protect minors, provide or openly disclose the information in the case of laws and regulations, the guardian of minors, or the need to protect minors.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Only in the case of laws and regulations, the guardians of minors clearly agree, or need to protect minors, provide or openly disclose the information.

text: If you are the guardian of the minor, please pay attention to whether the minor you guarded will use the service of the national K song after obtaining your authorization consent.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: The guardian of minors, please pay attention to whether the minor uses the service of the national K song after obtaining the authorization consent.

text: If you have doubts about the personal information of the minors you monitor, please contact us through the contact information in Section 10.
For more related privacy protection for minors, please refer to the "Child Privacy Protection Statement"
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: For the privacy protection of minors, see the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".

text: 9. Others

Tencent's "Privacy Policy" is a generally applicable general privacy clause. Among them, the user rights and information security guarantee measures stipulated in them are applicable to users of the national K song.
For example, Tencent's "Privacy Policy" is inconsistent or contradictory with the guidance of this privacy protection, please refer to the guidelines of this privacy protection.
